---
title: DUDIT vs ASSIST
---

## DUDIT vs ASSIST

When studying substance abuse and addiction, psychologists and social scientists often find themselves comparing different questionnaires and instruments like DUDIT (Drug Use Disorders Identification Test) and ASSIST (Alcohol, Smoking, and Substance Involvement Screening Test). The process, known as harmonization, is crucial for making both intra and inter-study comparisons. But as anyone who has manually done this can attest, the process is both tedious and subjective. Enter Harmony, a tool that uses large language models to help in the harmonization of various tools. The **DUDIT vs ASSIST** comparison is just one example where Harmony can be massively beneficial.

## Compare the items in DUDIT and ASSIST

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXMgaXQgaGFwcGVuZWQsIG92ZXIgdGhlIHBhc3QgeWVhciwgdGhhdCB5b3UgaGF2ZSBub3QgYmVlbiBhYmxlIHRvIHN0b3AgdGFraW5nIGRydWdzIG9uY2UgeW91IHN0YXJ0ZWQ_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gb3ZlciB0aGUgcGFzdCB5ZWFyIGhhdmUgeW91IHRha2VuIGRydWdzIGFuZCB0aGVuIG5lZ2xlY3RlZCB0byBkbyBzb21ldGhpbmcgeW91IHNob3VsZCBoYXZlIGRvbmU__In1dfSwgeyJpbnN0cnVtZW50X25hbWUiOiAiQWxjb2hvbCwgU21va2luZywgYW5kIFN1YnN0YW5jZSBJbnZvbHZlbWVudCBTY3JlZW5pbmcgVGVzdCAtIFN1YnN0YW5jZSBVc2UgKEFTU0lTVCkiLCAicXVlc3Rpb25zIjogW3sicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXZlIHlvdSBldmVyIHVzZWQgYW55IGRydWcgYnkgaW5qZWN0aW9uPyJ9XX1d" target="harmonyapp">Import just ASSIST into Harmony</a> - compare ASSIST with other instruments

Harmony takes into consideration each item in both DUDIT and ASSIST, and gives a percentage match. This objective comparison makes the harmonization process more precise and less time-consuming. The "DUDIT Vs ASSIST" comparison using Harmony, for instance, provides a comparative view of the questionnaires, aiding researchers in understanding the overlap and differences between the two. Also, Harmony works across multiple languages making it both flexible and versatile for global research applications.


{{< card heading="Try Harmony" copy="Compare DUDIT and ASSIST " url="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app" >}}

{{< youtube cEZppTBj1NI >}}


If you're planning a **DUDIT vs ASSIST** analysis, we highly recommend giving Harmony a try. You can select from Harmony's extensive database or you can upload your own instruments. Taking the DUDIT vs ASSIST comparison as an example, researchers can either input the items manually or upload the PDFs of the questionnaires. The web interface is highly intuitive and user-friendly. Try Harmony today and discover a more efficient way of harmonizing questionnaires.
